thread.title: Dottie Pepper back to full-time golf broadcasting with CBS
thread.title_full: Dottie Pepper back to full-time golf broadcasting with CBS

title: Dottie Pepper back to full-time golf broadcasting with CBS
text:
> Top News Dottie Pepper back to full-time golf broadcasting with CBS FILE - In this Feb. 7, 2013, file photo, Solheim Cup assistant captain Dottie Pepper smiles at an NBA game in Denver. Pepper has joined the CBS Sports golf broadcasting team and will return to full-time work. (AP Photo/David Zalubowski, File) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
